keyword: calories in an 8 ounce ribeye steak
title: Calories in an 8 Ounce Ribeye Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in an 8 ounce ribeye steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: Calories in an 8 Ounce Ribeye Steak
assumptions: USDA Choice grade, broiled or grilled to medium doneness, separable lean and fat, trimmed to 1/8" fat; 8 oz â‰ˆ 227 g cooked weight.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grade, cut, cooking method, fat trimming, and doneness; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: An 8-ounce ribeye steak provides ~661 kcal and ~55 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Lean-only cut (no fat cap, per 8 oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8 ounce ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 661 kcal for a standard cooked ribeye with fat.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: About 55 g of protein, making it a high-protein option.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ribeye?
faqs.a: Yes; grilling or broiling keeps it lower than pan-frying with oil, which adds ~100 kcal.

faqs.q: How much fat is in an 8 ounce ribeye?
faqs.a: Around 50 g total fat, including 20 g saturated, due to marbling.

faqs.q: Are these values for raw or cooked ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw is similar but cooking reduces water content, concentrating nutrients.
